suggestions.title: Immediate Hydration Needed — Offer Full Glass of Water Now
suggestions.description: User 1002: At 10:33 AM, only about half a glass (≈100ml) of water and 3ml through food has been consumed. Right now, offer the person a full glass of water (200ml), encourage them to drink it fully, and observe for any difficulty while drinking. Use gentle prompts and supervise to ensure the entire glass is finished.
